Attacks.Name: Gust
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt.

Attacks.Name: Quick Attack
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, this character may make a free Move action.

Superpowers.Name: Keen Eye
Superpowers.Effect: This character cannot have its attack dice modified by an enemy character.

Superpowers.Name: Tangled Feet
Superpowers.Effect: If this character is under the Confused condition, it adds 1 die to its defense rolls.

Attacks.Name: Feather Dance
Attacks.Effect: Choose an enemy character within range. That character subtracts 1 die from its attack rolls until the end of its next activation.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Pidgeotto character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
